CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 21, 1946, pg. 17 reads: "Manger Scene - The Birth of Christ, the story of the origin of Christmas, when the Three Wise Men made the journey to the manger in a Bethlehem stable, bringing gifts for the newly-born Messiah, was portrayed in this school play staged by Herron Hill Junior High School students this week.-Harris photo."
TitMainTitle: Children enacting nativity play on stage with student orchestra in pit in foreground, Herron Hill Junior High School
